summary: Project includes a profile page UI; current task is correcting back button placement relative to the pond avatar.
known_issues: Profile page: back button was placed on top of the pond avatar; it should be positioned to the left of the avatar.

existing_features.title: On the Frog Profile page (`frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx`), add/restore a Reddit-style Back button and position it to the left of the profile (pond) avatar within the profile header row so it never overlaps the avatar.
Implement Back button navigation behavior on the Frog Profile page to go to the previous page using browser history when possible.

Match the Frog Profile Back button visual styling to the existing Lily page Back button (icon + “Back” label, muted foreground, hover state, rounded hit area) while keeping all user-facing text in English.

projectName: Fix Frog Profile Page back button placement (left of avatar, not overlapping)
